greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T, read by rows, equal to the matrix square of triangle A113350, where T transforms column k of T into column k+1 of T.
comment: Also, T transforms column k of A113340^2 into column k+1 of A113340^2. Column 0: T(n,0) = A113356(n) = A113346(n+1) - 1, where A113346 equals column 0 of triangle A113345 (=A113340^2).
formula: T(n, k) = sum_{j=0..n-k} T(n-k, j)*T(j+k-1, k-1) for n>=k>0 with T(n, 0) = A113346(n+1) - 1, for n>=0.
example: where T transforms column k of T into column k+1:
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Nov 08 2005
